title: Zed Skin Leaked(Mecha Zed)
body: Hello,as a big huge {{champion:238}} player/fan.I went to RAF manager to take a look at {{champion:238}} files.After a look-around I found a skin that was named "CyberNinja" it was under the skin section,so I went to take a look and it leaded me to this photo (http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/attachment.php?attachmentid=728658).I went to do some research on it and found someone else who has also seen the image and posted about it.(in the na forum).Now I think this is a WIP zed skin.What do you guys think about this?

replies.body: Remember we still have file names for Zed, labelled Cyber Ninja Zed and Proxy Zed.
Do u think its a new skin though?

I believe these files have been there for a while though. Since we all keep asking for a skin for a popular champ I really hope we get one soon, hopefully a legendary or maybe as the S5 Ultimate, but id be happy with Project: Zed as a skin with Yasuo, Ninja v Samurai.

> [{quoted}](name=ShadowCuber,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=VQRr0pnx,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2015-05-19T04:26:02.662+0000)
>
> I believe these files have been there for a while though. Since we all keep asking for a skin for a popular champ I really hope we get one soon, hopefully a legendary or maybe as the S5 Ultimate, but id be happy with Project: Zed as a skin with Yasuo, Ninja v Samurai.

I think a 1350RP skin would be fine if it is a really well done skin. Like the new Star Guardian Lux skin, that's made a lot of Lux players happy.
Yeah exactly Project: Zed would be an awesome concept, but with so many teaser finds and wait I'm sure we'll have something amazing soon.
either the ulti skin for next year or rito is planning to make a PROJECT squad.

https://www.google.com.au/url?sa=i&rct=j&q=&esrc=s&source=images&cd=&cad=rja&uact=8&ved=0CAcQjRw&url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2Fwatch%3Fv%3D7HYJcGPLybo&ei=l7tZVcbyGInX8gWn5YLgAg&psig=AFQjCNHcnfWUy3MyrZREhyArUGttJqNIQQ&ust=1432030476766527 

Plz no new zed skin, i want no more bronze/silver zed feeders

stop complatin'

complatin'(complaining+hating)

Zed is love Zed is life,deal with it xD.
It was so bad you had to reply aye
